record.dc:title: 50BT20, 15BT20, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Village. Structure 6, vertical section of south wall.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: In vertical section occasional postmold outlines are seen, which cannot be picked up in the horizontal face. This picture demonstrates a fairly good example of that feature for this site. These postmold outlines extend to a somewhat greater depth than the corner postmolds do. In this photograph the halved fire basin has been removed. View from the South. See also photos 48, 49.
